Thank you for downloading Deers pack.

This is a semi realistic 3d model and animations of Red deer, Moose and Caribou. 
-Models folder contains RedDeerModelLowPoly.FBX, RedDeerModelMiddlePoly.FBX, RedDeerModelTowLODs.FBX,
 MooseLowPoly.FBX,MooseMiddlePoly.FBX, MooseTowLODs.FBX,
 CaribouModelLowPoly.FBX,CaribouMiddlePoly.FBX, CaribouModelTowLODs.FBX.
 .
-Animations folder contains FBX files of animations.
Walk and run animations are compatible with root motion.
-Animations/OnPlace folder contains On Place variations of walk and run animations.
These are not used in the demo.
-Textures folder contains textures.
These are main contents of this package.

Demo folder contains an example use of the Deers model. 
-Demo/Scenes folder contains demo scene.
-Demo/Prefabs folder contains prefabs that are used in the demo scene.
-Demo/Scripts folder contains scripts that are used in the demo scene.
-Demo/Animator folder contains animator controller that is used the prefab.

http://eizouasobi.blogspot.jp
support@ryousirikigaku.com
